issue.title: [C#] File / Stream serialization fails due to type mismatch / missing footer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4284](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4284). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ArrowFileWriter does not write a footer during serialization. Various array types (BooleanType, UInt8Type) match with incorrect types in the Accept visitor implementation.
